rule.name: MEG_VM_UpdateVehicle
rule.description: Form used by Registrar to update existing vehicle in the fleet
rule.definition: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_formLayout_v1"( label: "Update the " & ri!vehicle.make & " " & ri!vehicle.model, contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"( columns: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Make", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "Enter the make of vehicle", placeholder: "ie Ford", value: ri!vehicle.make, saveInto: ri!vehicle.make, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", required: false, requiredmessage: "", readonly: false, disabled: false, masked: false, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "Model", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: "Enter the model of vehicle", value: ri!vehicle.model, saveInto: ri!vehicle.model, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"( label: "VIN", labelPosition: "ABOVE", instructions: len(ri!vehicle.vin)&" /17", value: ri!vehicle.vin, saveInto: ri!vehicle.vin, refreshAfter: "KEYPRESS", validations: if( len(ri!vehicle.vin)<>17, "Please enter a valid 17 digit VIN number", {} ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: "Description", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!vehicle.description, saveInto: ri!vehicle.description, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", height: "MEDIUM", validations: {} ) } ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"( contents: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dropdownField"( label: "Category", labelPosition: "ABOVE", placeholderLabel: "--- Select a Category ---", choiceLabels: #"_a-0000e37d-16a2-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_29219", choiceValues: #"_a-0000e37d-16a2-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_29219", value: ri!vehicle.category, saveInto: ri!vehicle.category, required: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Mileage", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!vehicle.mileage, saveInto: ri!vehicle.mileage, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", required: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_integerField"( label: "Year", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!vehicle.year, saveInto: ri!vehicle.year, refreshAfter: "UNFOCUS", required: true, validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_radioButtonField"( label: "Status", labelPosition: "ABOVE", choiceLabels: {"Active", "Inactive"}, choiceValues: {true(), false()}, value: ri!vehicle.status, saveInto: ri!vehicle.status, required: true, choiceLayout: "STACKED", validations: {} ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dateField"( label: "Next Maintenance Due on", labelPosition: "ABOVE", value: ri!vehicle.nextSchedule, saveInto: ri!vehicle.nextSchedule, required: true, validations: if( ri!vehicle.nextSchedule<today(), "Please choose a date in the future", {} ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_fileUploadField_v1"( label: "Image", labelPosition: "ABOVE", target: #"_a-0000e37d-16a2-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_31753", saveInto: ri!vehicle.imageId, validations: {} ) } ) } ) }, buttons: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonLayout"( primaryButtons: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonWidget"( label: "Submit", submit: true, style: "PRIMARY" ) }, secondaryButtons: {} ) )
